en.title:
<size=50>Attack on Blob</size>
Divide and Conquer
en.health_warning: Watch out! Once the health bar is empty, you will have to start over!
en.intro_alert_1: Multiple blobs of epic proportion detected!
en.intro_alert_2: It seems these blobs came from a lab, and have somehow grown uncontrollably.
en.intro_alert_3: We must find a way to shrink them back!
en.intro_op_0: According to the latest studies of blobology, the only way to shrink them is by the power of the divide operation.
en.intro_op_1: Divide and conquer, as they say!
en.intro_op_2: Go forth, our intrepid hero! Use your mathematical might to vanquish these menacing blobs!
en.lesson1_intro_0: Dividing a large number can be daunting, but with the right trick, it can be a breeze!
en.lesson1_intro_1: Let’s briefly examine a useful mathematical principle to help us.
en.lesson1_placeValue_0: First, let’s take a quick look at how large numbers are arranged by single digit numbers.
en.lesson1_placeValue_1: These digits are placed by multiples of 10’s, since we use a base 10 number system.
en.lesson1_placeValueDistribute_0: Now with that in mind, we can split the dividend up by this principle.
en.lesson1_placeValueDistribute_1: Splitting up a number to be added later is known as the distributive property.
en.lesson1_placeValueDistribute_2: Pay close attention to how the distributive property works!
en.lesson1_end_0: Let’s go ahead and put this into practice when we face the mega blob!
en.lesson2_intro_0: This time around, we will be dividing with double-digit divisors.
en.lesson2_intro_1: It would be too troublesome to deal with these blobs using our current technique.
en.lesson2_intro_2: Fortunately, we have one more trick up our sleeves!
en.lesson2_areaModel_0: Since division is the inverse of multiplication, you can visualize the equation as the dimensions of an area.
en.lesson2_areaModel_1: In this case, the quotient of the division is the width of the area.
en.lesson2_areaModelDistribute_0: We can use this model to partially solve the division with smaller numbers.
en.lesson2_areaModelDistribute_1: Observe how the area is being split into two.
en.lesson2_areaModelDistribute_2: Adding the split values will then give you the whole answer.
en.lesson2_end_0: Now why don’t we try this new technique with the next mega blob!
en.level1_intro_0: Look out! Two blobs have appeared.
en.level1_intro_1: In order to beat the mega blob, we must merge all the blobs into one final quotient blob.
en.level1_intro_2: Those numbers don’t look that scary. We can directly solve the division.
en.instruct_drag_blob_0: In order to merge the two blobs, simply drag one to another like so.
en.op_instruct_0: Now you must solve the operation by typing in the number via the numpad.
en.op_instruct_1: You can also use the keyboard to enter the numbers.
en.op_instruct_2: Once you feel confident with your answer, press the ENTER button on the numpad (or your keyboard).
en.attack_instruct_success_0: Excellent! We’ve managed to clear the blobs!
en.attack_instruct_boss_hp_0: This is the representation of the mega blob’s health.
en.attack_instruct_boss_hp_1: As you can see, it has been reduced.
en.attack_instruct_boss_hp_2: Once it’s empty, the mega blob will be defeated.
en.split_instruct_0: Now we are dealing with a much larger blob!
en.split_instruct_1: Let’s split the blob up into two to make our life easier.
en.split_instruct_2: Press the sparkly blob as shown to proceed.
en.split_op_instruct_0: Here you can see a representation of how the blob is going to be split.
en.split_op_instruct_1: We will be splitting the blob by transferring its digits to a new blob.
en.split_op_instruct_2: Simply click on any of the digits to transfer them.
en.split_op_instruct_3: Once you are happy with the new split numbers, press the SPLIT button.
en.split_op_instruct_4: Remember, both new numbers must be wholly divisible for the split to succeed!
en.split_op_success_0: Nicely done! The blobs have now been split into two.
en.split_op_success_1: You can split the blobs further if you want, but there’s a limit!
en.split_op_success_2: Once all the blobs have been merged into the final quotient blob, we will be able to attack.
en.level3_intro_0: Watch out! These blobs are not to be trifled with!
en.split_instruct2_0: Just as you have done many times before, go ahead a press the sparkly blob.
en.split_op_partial_instruct_0: Here we are going to reduce the blob’s large number by multiplying the divisor with a number.
en.split_op_partial_instruct_1: First you must specify the number to multiply the divisor. Simply type in the number, and press ENTER.
en.split_op_partial_next_instruct_0: Now you must type in the correct answer for the multiplication.
en.split_op_partial_next_instruct_1: Once you press ENTER, you’ll see that number subtracted from the dividend blob.
en.split_op_partial_next_instruct_2: If the resulting value is less than zero, then try again with a smaller multiplication number!
en.split_op_partial_success_0: Good! The blob’s value has been reduced, and a partial quotient blob has appeared.
en.split_op_partial_success_1: Splitting up large numbers this way will make it easier to deal with two or more-digit divisors!
en.split_op_partial_success_2: I’ve said everything that I can to help you, the rest is up to you. Go forth, and defeat the mega blobs!
en.end_desc: You have vanquished all the mega blobs! Peace has returned to the world once more!
